name: vikunja
description: Vikunja is a self-hosted, open-source to-do and project management platform. It offers lists, kanban boards, sharing, and reminders, with mobile apps, a web client, and an API.
features: Task lists: Organize tasks into lists and projects for structured task management.
Kanban boards: Visualize workflow with kanban boards and drag-and-drop task movement.
Due dates: Set deadlines for tasks with calendar views and overdue highlighting.
Reminders: Receive notifications for upcoming tasks and deadlines via email or push.
Subtasks: Break down complex tasks into subtasks with nested checklists.
Labels and priorities: Categorize and prioritize tasks with custom labels and priority levels.
Team collaboration: Share lists with team members and assign tasks to collaborators.
Attachments: Add files and documents to tasks for complete context and reference.
Recurring tasks: Set up tasks that repeat daily, weekly, or on custom schedules.
Mobile apps: Access tasks from Android devices with native mobile applications.
CalDAV sync: Sync tasks with calendar applications using CalDAV protocol.
API access: Integrate with other tools using the comprehensive REST API.
